item.title: In Praise of Pilates
item.description: In searching for something to write about today, I wondered whether I had ever written about Pilates on this blog before. I modified the search of my posts from yesterday’s post to look for the word Pilates I could have also just used CMD+F in Visual Studio Code, but where’s the fun in that? and it only came up once in a post about revisiting my ambitions ten years on.
